name: 20/21 Y1B - Team 8
description:
Creative Direction A weighty sphere with a dash and wall-jump ability, that has to get through ranged attack hazards (guns that shoot) in order to get to the end of the level.

This games is in production so don't expect a finished or polished game. Some assets and are going to be added in the coming weeks. And levels are going to be made.

Controls

Esc >> Main Menu

Q>> Pause Game

!! Crouching is removed

Features we want feedback on
  • Mainly on challenges. Are they fun? and how difficult do you find them to be?
Latest update's additions:
  • 2 Completely new gym levels
  • 1 Gym level updated
  • Collectibles are updated and made smaller.
  • The game now tracks your time spent in a level, the number of times you died, and the number of collectibles you collected.
  • The crouching feature has been removed.
Known bugs/issues
  • Player can sometimes still move around while death animation is playing
  • Collectibles don't work correctly in Tycho's gym level.
developers: IGAD Breda University of Applied Science
